BEHAVIOR.PAN_SIDEMENU_HINT: Drag your finger horizontally across the screen to open the side menu
BEHAVIOR.TITLE: Behavior

CLASSROOM.CREATION_SUBTITLE: You can add or modify classrooms to organize your students in different groups
CLASSROOM.NAME: Classroom

DAY.CREATION_SUBTITLE: With these records you can track each student daily

ERR.AUTH_INVALID: Email or password was not correct
ERR.CLASSROOM_EXISTS: There is already a classroom with the same name
ERR.EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: This email is already being used
ERR.PASSWORD_INVALID: The password must be at least 6 characters
ERR.SUBJECT_EXISTS: There is already a subject with the same name
ERR.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

HINT.BIRTHDATE: Press the calendar or enter the date (DD/MM/YYYY)
HINT.CLASSROOM: You can group students in different classrooms
HINT.CLASSROOM_STUDENT_LIST: Select the students enrolled in this classroom
HINT.OBSERVATIONS: Add a brief description of the student
HINT.SUBJECTS: Mark the subjects that will be taught to the student
HINT.SUBJECT_STUDENT_LIST: Select the students enrolled in this subject
HINT.TITLE: Add a small descriptive title.

MSG.APP_UPDATED: The application has been updated with new features
MSG.APP_UPDATE_READY: An update is prepared. Reload the page to get the improvements.
MSG.CLASSROOM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this classroom?
MSG.CLASSROOM_DELETE_2: Students grouped in this classroom will cease to be
MSG.DAY_CREATE_OK: A new record has been created
MSG.DAY_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
MSG.DAY_STUDENT_ARCHIVED: You cannot create records of an archived student. Unarchive it first
MSG.LOGOUT: Do you want to log out?
MSG.LOGOUT_CONFIRM: If you do we hope you come back soon :)
MSG.RELOAD_PAGE_FOR_CHANGES: Reload the page for changes to take effect
MSG.SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE: This service will be available soon
MSG.STUDENT_ARCHIVE: Are you sure you want to archive this student?
MSG.STUDENT_ARCHIVE_2: If you do, it will not appear in the student listings and your records will be hidden. Nor can you create records associated with this student
MSG.STUDENT_CREATE_OK: A new student has signed up for class
MSG.STUDENT_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this student?
MSG.STUDENT_DELETE_2: Note that the daily records associated with this student will also be deleted. If this is not what you want, remember that you can always archive it
MSG.STUDENT_DELETE_OK: The student has been successfully deleted
MSG.STUDENT_UNARCHIVE: Are you sure you want to unarchive this student?
MSG.STUDENT_UNARCHIVE_2: Doing so will reappear in student listings and their records will be displayed. You can also re-create records associated with this student.
MSG.SUBJECT_CREATE_OK: The subject has been created correctly
MSG.SUBJECT_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this subject?
MSG.SUBJECT_DELETE_2: Students enrolled in this subject will cease to be
MSG.SUBJECT_DELETE_OK: The subject has been successfully deleted
MSG.WILL_LOSE_THE_CHANGES: If you continue you will lose all changes that have not been saved
MSG.YES_ACCOUNT: Do you already have an account?

SUBJECT.CREATION_SUBTITLE: You can add or modify subjects to teach your students and enroll as many as you need in them
